itemDescription: British Virgin Islands footballer and manager (born 1977)

wikipedia_page.main: Avondale Williams (born 10 October 1977) is a British Virgin Islander football manager and former player. He played as a forward for Veterans, Rangers, and Islanders FC.  He is the British Virgin Islands national team's all-time leading scorer with five goals.

link_mentions.page: British Virgin Islands national football team

response: NB: Bermuda have protested the eligibility of three BVI players (Montgomery Butler, Avondale Williams, Venton James) as being Saint Vincentians.

link_mentions.page: List of people with surname Williams
response: *Avondale Williams (born 1977), British Virgin Islands footballer and manager
